[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Climax from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, discard the remaining cards to the Waiting Room. If you moved a card to your hand in this manner, choose a card in your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.

[C] For each of your other Characters with either ::Adventurer:: or ::Magic::, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or by effect of MERGE to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them, put it in your hand, and discard the rest to the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "D..Defensive Power..?" is in your Climax Zone and you have 4 or more other ::Adventurer:: and/or ::Magic:: Characters, until the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains the following ability. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When damage dealt by Character Opposite this or by this Character is Cancelled, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.

"Search your Library for up to 1 '"Fierce Engagement" Vanir' or '"Forest Rest" Darkness', show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library."

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 2 '"Muscle-Brained Crusader" Darkness' in your Waiting Room and put them on the bottom of your Library in any order.
[S] MERGE [Put a '"Forest Rest" Darkness' from your Stage face-up under this as Marker] Search your Library for up to 1 '"Muscle-Brained Crusader" Darkness', put it in the Slot this is in, put all Markers from under this as well as this card face-up under that '"Muscle-Brained Crusader" Darkness' as Markers in any order, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, this gains +2000 Power and +1 Soul for the turn.

If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 2 Cost 0 or lower Characters from among them, place them to separate Slots on the Stage, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

(Climax cards count as Level 0 for this effect)
